events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's case has been classified under refund due to their request for money back on an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. from the refunds department for handling.
Hello! This is Sarah. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide photos of the received item and the packaging to proceed with your refund?
I have attached clear photos of the wrong item and the shipping label as you requested for verification.
Thank you for the photos. We will process your full refund within 3-5 business days and you do not need to return the wrong item.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund solution sounds great. Thank you for resolving this promptly.
The refund has been officially approved and is now being processed by our finance team. Case marked as resolved.
Hello again! Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received. Please let us know if you have further concerns.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
